TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemanticResultValue extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个语义值和选择性地将该值与语音识别语法的组件关联。

span.span: Represents a semantic value and optionally associates the value with a component of a speech recognition grammar.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SemanticResultValue`构造函数支持指定的基础数据类型的实例`bool`， `int`， `float`，或`string`。The `SemanticResultValue` constructors support specifying an instance with an underlying data type of `bool`, `int`, `float`, or `string`. 构造函数可以创建`SemanticResultValue`中两种情况下任一实例：A constructor can create a `SemanticResultValue` instance in either of two circumstances: - `SemanticResultValue`使用时，实例必须是与语法元素显式关联构造。The `SemanticResultValue` instance must be explicitly associated with a grammar element when using a to construct a . - `SemanticResultValue`已与字符串值短语关联或对象。The `SemanticResultValue` is already associated with a string value phrase or a object.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies a semantic value.
